title: Cen-Tec Systems 37902 Microfiber 3-Pack Super Towel, 24 by 36-Inch, Gray
features: Large 24 x 36 Inch Towel -- Much bigger than most competing towels
Microfiber products can be washed hundreds of time, maintaining their extraordinary cleaning static charge and liquid pickup capabilities
Perfect for general clean-up around the house
description: The general purpose towel is a classic blend of microfiber knitted into a plush cloth that provides excellent static charge and absorption properties. This cloth is heavier and a more loosely woven cloth that is generally preferred for all purpose and heavy duty cleaning. The towel, like all microfiber, is washable.
